attributes.action: Save Neighbourhood Policing in rural community's and Fair Funding & Debate
attributes.additional_details: We held a Public Meeting on the 21st Sept 2015 with the PCC of D & C Police and senior officers of D & C Police which started to leak the true impacts on rural policing in the community's due to Government cutbacks. So this then has in the past few weeks stired up the police and more info has leaked out about the true impact of the cuts and this is a bleek future so we need to stand up and fight for a better deal for the Police in rural areas and keep the streets safe, Sign up please help
attributes.background: In the light of a public meeting which has revelled the true cut backs due to Government cuts we will lose all PCSO's and neighbourhood Policing in the rural community's, so I am calling for Fair funding for rural police forces per head like the MET Police and I would like a review in Parliament
